state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, travel east. With that over with, venture east. And then, make an attempt to venture north. That done, take a trip west. With that accomplished, make an attempt to take a trip north. Following that, make an attempt to go to the north. And then, take a trip north. And then, head east. After that, attempt to head south. Then, head south. And then, go to the south. And then, attempt to go to the east. And then, try to travel east. Following that, move east. With that done, pick up the coin from the floor of the cellar. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Shower =- You're now in a shower. There is an unblocked exit to the east. > -= Shower =-0/1
